com.locuslabs.sdk.maps.model

Interface Theme

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultTheme

    public interface Theme
    The Theme class is used to apply GUI properties such as fonts and colors to the widgets provided by the SDK. A class instances of a Theme is immutable. The ThemeBuilder class acts as an abstract factory for creating new instances of the Theme class.
    Since:
    1.2.5
    See Also:
    ThemeBuilder, Theme
